game_description: Go far. Go high. Don't touch the lava. And never stop. VR version of the popular kids' game the Floor Is Lava. Modes: -Single-Player mode: Beat the highscore -Multiplayer Versus Mode: Race against your rival Developed by: https://www.yourvrexperience.com
